actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendments, H. Rept. 94-1672.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution that there be printed as a House document a concise and selected nationwide record of the Bicentennial Captive Nations Week proclamations, statements, and relevant matters.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendments, H. Rept. 94-1672) Directs that there be printed as a House document a record of the Bicentennial Captive Nations Week proclamations.

titles.title: A resolution that there be printed as a House document a concise and selected nationwide record of the Bicentennial Captive Nations Week proclamations, statements, and relevant matters.
